name: ContactPoint
description: A contact point for a person or organization - phone, email, fax, etc. Based on FHIR ContactPoint and common ERP patterns

properties.name: system
properties.description: Type of contact point (phone, email, fax, url, sms, other)

properties.name: value
properties.description: The actual contact point value (phone number, email address, etc.)

properties.name: use
properties.description: Purpose of this contact point (work, home, mobile, main, billing, support, emergency)

properties.name: label
properties.description: Human-readable label for this contact point

properties.name: period
properties.description: Time period when this contact point is valid
